center.font: Game Extractor - Extensible Game Archive Editor

Created and Developed by wattostudios (c) 2002-2025
https://www.watto.org/extract
Game Extractor is a program that opens and manipulates game archives. See the Readme file for further information and contact details, or visit the website.

span.font: Game Extractor (Full Version) is a purchasable product!
Distribution of Game Extractor (Full Version) violates the terms of the legal agreement, and holds you liable for prosecution through law!
